name: Salad Dressing - Honey Mustard
description: This low-carb, low-sugar Honey Mustard Salad Dressing is a healthier twist on a classic, making it perfect for those following a health-conscious diet without sacrificing flavor. Dive into a blend of tangy mustard and sweet undertones, guaranteed to elevate your salads!

recipeInstructions.text: Place the mustard and sugar substitute in a small mixing bowl.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Whisk until the sugar substitute is completely dissolved and the mixture is smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: Taste and adjust the sweeteness by adding more sugar substitute if necessary. Your Honey Mustard Salad Dressing is ready to dress your favorite salads.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3
